page.title: 16INDUSTRY IN READING
page.content: Small factory unit groups exist at the edge of the CBD but these are dispersed,with about 20% of firms with less than 100 sq.m.Larger modern groups exist in Elgar Rd, Rose kiln lane and Berkley Ave,but no estate exeeds 7ha.Most are light engineering often hi-tech firms.Digital,Racal,ICL have small units in the area norbain (fibre-optic)Dataskil(computers) keithley (electronic)instruments all illustrate the new technology.Yellow pages has 49 computer-based firms in the area and 33 electronic and electrical.200ha of{kennet floodplain} attracts developers in the south. Conflict exist between conservation (farmland/water supply/wildlife/ recreation/archaeology)and expansion (industry/A33 relief rd/waste disposal).
